measured_by: sequence of clicks in the Mouselab paradigm
justification: "Thus, the sequence of clicks a player makes traces their decision strategy."
"Payne et al. (1988) ... operationalized effort by decomposing heuristics into units of 'elementary information processes' (EIPs)."

measured_by: relative transition index between alternative-based and attribute-based clicks
justification: "We can measure the relative frequency of alternative-based versus attribute-based processing in a given trial as the number of sequential transitions between alternative-based clicks minus the number of sequential transitions between attribute-based clicks, divided by the sum of the two terms."

measured_by: attribute variance of proportion of clicks across outcomes
justification: "Attribute-variance in information gathering is defined as the variance of the proportion of clicks made on each row/outcome."

measured_by: alternative variance of proportion of clicks across gambles
justification: "Alternative-variance in information gathering is defined in the same way, but for columns."
"We first considered the total amount of information gathered (i.e., the number of clicks made)."
